quizDescription: Test your knowledge of world geography

questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.feedbackCorrect: Correct! Paris is the capital of France.
questions.feedbackIncorrect: Incorrect. The correct answer is Paris.

questions.question: Which city is the capital of Japan?
questions.feedbackCorrect: Right! Tokyo is Japan's bustling capital.
questions.feedbackIncorrect: No, Tokyo is the capital of Japan.

questions.question: The capital of Australia is:
questions.feedbackIncorrect: Actually, Canberra is the capital of Australia.
